com.ruegnerlukas.simplemath.matrix.matrixN

Class Matrixi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ruegnerlukas.simplemath.matrix.matrixN.Matrixi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMatrix, IMatrixi
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Matrix3i, Matrix4i

    public class Matrixi
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMatrixi

    • Constructor Summary

      creates matrix filled with the given value and with the given number of rows and columns
      Matrixi(IVector[] vectors, boolean asColumns)
      Creates a new matrix with the given vectors as either rows or columns
